name: Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport
address: 6225 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Offering a free 24-hour transfer service to LAX, Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport features spacious rooms with mid-century modern design and free WiFi. Venice Beach is 15 minutes’ drive away. An outdoor pool is available as well. A 55-inch cable HDTV is offered in each air-conditioned room at this full service hotel. Soundproof windows offer 24-hour comfort. Guest rooms also include a refrigerator, a coffee machine and a safe. Bathrooms have granite counter-tops, marble floors, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The restaurant onsite, unity la, offers a restaurant, open market, and a bar. The best of LA's ethnic neighborhoods and diverse communities come to life for our guests. unity la features a 24-hour open market and a unique offering of eclectic and savory choices. unity la is located on the lobby level. Guests can work out in the fitness center at Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport. Concierge services are available. This hotel is within 15 minutes’ drive of Marina Del Rey. Hollywood is 12 mi away. Westchester Golf Course is 2.5 mi away from this hotel.

name: Le Parc at Melrose
address: 733 North West Knoll Drive, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Discover an urban oasis and ultimate relaxation at this luxury boutique hotel, located in the heart of West Hollywood city center. Enjoy elegant amenities and state-of-the-art facilities, seconds from the action of the city. Le Parc at Melrose features numerous modern amenities and facilities. Guests can experience the beautiful city from the hotel's roof, equipped with tennis courts, a swimming pool and a sun deck. Accessible rooms are also available upon request. Only steps from Le Parc's front doors are many of the area's most famous attractions. Enjoy luxury shopping on Rodeo Drive, dine at legendary restaurants, or discover the vibrant nightlife of Santa Monica Boulevard.

name: W Hollywood
description: From start to finish, you'll be amazed by W Hollywood. Our hotel in Hollywood, CA, sits right on the lively streets of Hollywood Blvd and puts you at the center of top attractions like Hollywood Pantages Theatre, Hollywood Walk of Fame and the Capitol Records Building. With various eclectic event venues, West Hollywood will be the perfect backdrop for your next social gathering. You'll never have to wander far for good grub with our selection of American cuisine offered at Delphine Eatery and Station Hollywood - two of West Hollywood's finest restaurants in our hotel. The WET Deck is the ideal spot to make a splash in our rooftop pool after a workout in our hotel's fitness center. After an adventurous day, wind down in your hotel suite showcasing rich wood floors and fresh white linens accented with vibrant colors throughout the space. The views of the city lights from any part of our Hollywood Blvd hotel captivate the essence of W Hollywood.Marriott

name: Hotel Amarano Burbank - Hollywood
description: A 15-minute walk from the Warner Brothers Studio, this contemporary Burbank hotel offers on-site dining and an outdoor swimming pool. All rooms include Wi-Fi and bottled water. The Hotel Amarano Burbank-Hollywood features comfortably furnished rooms with luxury linens, a bathrobe. A flat-screen TV with complimentary satellite and an iPod docking station are included. A continental breakfast is served every morning. The Greek Theater is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Sunset Marquis
address: 1200 Alta Loma Road, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: The Sunset Marquis Hotel Los Angeles is located in the heart of West Hollywood. Hidden away in a tree lined cul-de-sac, it is just steps from the famed sidewalks of the Sunset Strip in West Hollywood. The property features 2 outdoor pools and an on-site restaurant. Villas at the property include unique amenities like private elevators, kitchens,dining rooms, televisions, and living rooms. Suites include similar amenities with toiletries and Bluetooth enabled mobile speakers. There is an on-site bar available at the hotel. There is also a fitness center and spa available on-site. Guests can enjoy the gardens and 24-hour front desk. The property also is home to successful recording studios and an art gallery. The Sunset Strip is less than 0.6 mi from the property, while the Farmer's Market Los Angeles is 1.7 mi away. Dolby Theater and the Hollywood Walk of Fame are 2.3 mi away. Los Angeles International Airport is 12 mi from the property.

name: Hotel MdR Marina del Rey - a DoubleTree by Hilton
description: Enjoy warm hospitality, spacious guest rooms and modern amenities at Hotel MDR Marina del Rey – a DoubleTree by Hilton. We will even welcome you with a warm chocolate chip cookie upon arrival. Set in the scenic resort community of Marina del Rey, just 5 miles from Los Angeles International Airport, this stylish hotel offers easy access to many famous Los Angeles neighborhoods and attractions such as Beverly Hills, Hollywood and Third Street Promenade. All of the Guest Rooms at this Marina del Rey hotel feature a variety of amenities to make you feel at home. Sleep well in the sumptuous bed, watch movies on the 32” LCD TV, work at the desk with complimentary WiFi and purchase snacks from the 24-hour market to store in the mini-refrigerator. Hold a business or social event for 5-225 people at this hotel in Marina del Rey with 7,350 sq ft of meeting space, including a 3,000 sq ft ballroom. Stay connected with a range of services in the 24-hour business center. Our dedicated staff are on hand to ensure your event is executed perfectly. Work out in the complimentary 24-hour Fitness Center or swim in the outdoor pool before savoring fresh seafood and cocktails in our stylish restaurant. Spend the day exploring the resort community of Marina del Rey. Wander the cobbled paths of the Fisherman’s Village, rent a kayak from the charming marina or travel to one of its exciting surrounding neighborhoods, like world-famous Venice Beach, Santa Monica, Playa Vista and Playa Del Rey.Hilton

name: Montrose at Beverly Hills
description: Montrose at Beverly Hills is located in a quiet West Hollywood neighborhood, just 0.5 mi from the famous Sunset Strip. The hotel offers a rooftop pool terrace with a pool, a tennis court, and cabanas. An on-site restaurant is also available. All rooms and suites at The Montrose feature an HDTV, a fireplace, a hairdryer, a refrigerator, and a fully stocked mini-bar. Most suites include a balcony and some offer a kitchenette. Accessible rooms are available upon request. Rooftop poolside dining is also available for those looking to eat a lighter meal outside. Other rooftop amenities include a full seasonal bar that overlooks Hollywood and a regulation-sized tennis court. Guests can also enjoy a welcome beverage, two complimentary bottles of welcome water, morning coffee & tea, and a fitness center. Notable venues such as Whiskey A Go Go, The Roxy Theater, & Soho House are within 10 minutes’ walk from the property. Rodeo Drive & Beverly Hills are 5 minutes’ drive away.

name: L'Ermitage Beverly Hills
description: Established in 1975 on a palm-lined residential boulevard, L’Ermitage is a discreet, luxurious getaway located a stone’s throw from the beating heart of Beverly Hills. As the first all-suite hotel in the nation, L’Ermitage is committed to offering travelers 5-star service, excellence in hospitality, and spacious accommodations. Our 116 suites preserve the residential elegance of the hotel’s original design while providing guests with a range of spacious layouts and modern appointments. Inside, guests will find luxurious walk-through dressing rooms with ample wardrobe space, full-length triptych mirrors with warm adjustable lighting, and generous vanities that evoke a sense of old Hollywood glamor. We offer flexible check-in and check-out, and ask our guests to provide estimated arrival time so we can accomodate their arrival time request. L'Ermitage has a complimentary car service available to our guests daily in our BMW 5-Series in a 2 mile radius. The property offers charging stations for eco-friendly cars as well as two TESLA charging stations. Guests at the L'Ermitage Beverly Hills can use the modern fitness center or have a drink at the trendy Lounge. Brunch and dinner are served at the hotel's Avec Nous restaurant. The Los Angeles County Museum of Art and the University of California are within a short drive of L'Ermitage Beverly Hills. The Los Angeles Convention Center is also nearby.

name: JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 900 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience a new level of luxury at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Offering an unbeatable location in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, only steps away from the excitement of L.A. LIVE, the Convention Center, Peacock Theatre and Crypto.com Arena, our hotel is ideally suited for both business and leisure travelers. Our hotel rooms and suites feature luxury bedding, a flat-screen TV, an ergonomic workspace and a marble bathroom, and many rooms offer magnificent downtown views. Savor fresh local fare at our on-site restaurants, pamper yourself at our spa or relax by our sparkling outdoor pool. Those seeking a remarkable destination for a business or social event in downtown Los Angeles can take advantage of 135,000 square feet of versatile, contemporary venue space, as well as knowledgeable planning and catering teams. Along with placing you moments from L.A. LIVE, our hotel is convenient to the University of Southern California and Dodger Stadium. Luxury abounds at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE.Marriott

name: Sixty Beverly Hills
description: Located in downtown Beverly Hills, California this 4-star hotel features a gourmet restaurant and outdoor rooftop pool and lounge with panoramic city views. The stylish rooms at SIXTY Beverly Hills feature dark hardwood floors and rich colors. French step-out balconies, 55” Flat Screen Smart TV’s with streaming capabilities, Nespresso machines, marble-clad bathrooms, luxury bath amenities, and terry bathrobes are offered in every room. Ella restaurant features flavors from all over the melting pot that is Los Angeles. Serving up local ingredients, Ella’s bold menu celebrates the Mediterranean, Asian, and Italian flavors found in our beloved city. And Ella doesn’t stop with delicious dishes. Paying homage to the history of the post-prohibition era, the cocktails showcase the rebirth of America’s greatest culinary contribution–the cocktail. Guests have free access to the state-of-the-art gym and rooftop pool. The 24-hour concierge desk can arrange various activities and car service is available. The University of California and Greystone Mansion are 2.5 mi from this boutique hotel. Luxury shopping along Rodeo Drive is less than 1 mi away.

name: Hilton Miami Dadeland
description: The new Hilton Miami Dadeland is just 13 miles from Miami International Airport and 2 miles from the famous Dadeland Center, Mall and Metro Station. The hotel is conveniently located near Baptist Hospital of Miami as well as South Miami's most popular shopping, dining, and attractions. Downtown Miami, beautiful beaches and neighboring hotspots of Coral Gables, Coconut Grove, Homestead, Key Biscayne and The Keys are all just minutes away. Settle in for a relaxing stay in one of our new upscale guest rooms and suites. Enjoy thoughtful features such as WiFi, LCD TVs, a work desk with ergonomic chair and a coffeemaker. Our suites also include a seating area, some with sofa beds and kitchenettes - ideal for families or extended stays. The hotel also offers Hilton's revolutionary, state-of-the-art Five Feet to Fitness in-room wellness concept, bringing 11 different fitness equipment and accessory options into the guest room. Five Feet to Fitness is perfect for exercise enthusiasts who prefer to work out in private. Furthering the focus on overall wellness for leisure and business travelers, Hilton Miami Dadeland features a health and wellness center with yoga and Pilates classes, a meditation garden, a heated outdoor pool and walking and jogging trails at the property. Hilton Miami Dadeland offers a large meeting and event space in the area, with 10,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor meeting space, including a 6,250-square-foot ballroom with private outdoor patio and dedicated pre-function areas. In addition to the hotel's new farm-to-table restaurant, Hilton Miami Dadeland offers a grab-n-go pantry, Starbucks, a Wall of Water bar with bottled water from around the world and room service.Hilton

name: Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove
description: Located in Miami, a few steps from Cocowalk Shopping Center, Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has accommodations with free bikes, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel, rooms contain a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, certain accommodations at Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove also feature a sea view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has a terrace. Vizcaya Museum is 2.8 miles from the hotel, while University of Miami is 3.2 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.2 miles from Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove.

name: Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: beach services (2 chairs, 2 bottles of water, 1 umbrella, towels): 15% discount on Spa & Salon services: 2 in-room bottles of water: small sunblock: turndown services on request: Pressreader.Experience the beautiful Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach hotel at world-famous 101 Ocean Drive of South Beach, Miami. Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences On The Beach
address: 17875 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Reminiscent of a Mediterranean villa, Acqualina invites you to step into a world of luxury with unprecedented accommodations and service, world-class dining destinations with four restaurants including the new Avra Miami and Il Mulino New York, three oceanfront swimming pools, Acqualina Spa, spacious meeting rooms, and AcquaMarine, an innovative marine biology-based children's program. Recent introductions to the resort include a new Adult Pool experience and a Floridian-meets-Mediterranean menu at the beachside Costa Grill. The luxury seaside haven is located on 4.5 beachfront acres in Miami’s Sunny Isles Beach, and conveniently located between Miami International Airport and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Designed to offer a sense of modern luxury with classic furnishings and finishes, the richly appointed accommodations are the hallmark of the guest experience at Acqualina. Offerings include 54 guest rooms and 44 suites, all offering expansive floor plans and breathtaking views from private balconies. One, Two and Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are available. Only 10 minute drive from the Acqualina Resort are the luxury shops and restaurants of Bal Harbor. The vibrant South Beach area as well as the legendary Art Deco district is also within driving distance. A family owned and operated property, Acqualina is a recipient of the coveted Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star Award for both the hotel and spa, as well as the AAA Five Diamond Award. Acqualina is also named the #1 Best Resort in the U.S. and the #1 Best Hotel in the U.S. by U.S. News & World Report.USA Today named Acqualina Best Destination Resort in the U.S.

name: SERENA Hotel Aventura Miami, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: The SERENA Hotel Aventura is moments away from world class shopping at Aventura Mall and neighbors to Gulf Stream Park and Casino, where you can enjoy live horse races, fine restaurants, gambling and shopping. We are located in the epicenter of the Aventura Medical District and the nearest hotel to the Aventura Hospital. Enjoy refined contemporary rooms and suites in a relaxed atmosphere. A portion of our suites feature separate living and sleeping areas featuring including a fully equipped kitchen. We offer a full restaurant and bar, a conference room, fitness center and rooftop swimming pool. SERENA is derived from the Latin word serenus, meaning clear, tranquil, or serene. Whether you’ve spent your day under the sun, shopping or working you can unplug and arrive at your place of tranquility.Hilton

name: The Mutiny Hotel
description: Offering a heated outdoor pool, the Mutiny Luxury Suites Hotel overlooks Sailboat Bay and is 1053 ft from the Coconut Grove shopping and dining district. Features include a restaurant, bar, and sauna. Kitchen and sofa bed are provided in all suites. Coconut Grove Mutiny Luxury Suites Hotel extras include 2 flat-screen TVs and a Bose® Bluetooth® docking station. Room service is offered for a fee. Free WiFi in public areas, a fitness center, and a hot tub in addition to a 24-hour front desk are available to guests throughout their stay. Massages and in-room dining are offered for a fee. Table 14 Bar & Restaurant is the product of JC & Cristina Digon’s vision and passion along with Executive Chef Nilton Castillo’s international cuisine. Table 14 features breakfast, lunch, dinner, and room service menus. Miami city center and the University of Miami are within 19 minutes’ drive away. The hotel is also 2 mi from Viscaya Museum & Gardens and 5.8 mi from the South Beach Art Deco District.

name: Provident Doral At The Blue
description: Provident Doral at the Blue features holiday villas and each one includes a full kitchen. Guests will enjoy access to a resort-style pool and the Miami International Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away. Free WiFi is available in each of these Miami villas along with flat-screen TVs. All units have a spa bath and some have a private balcony or an additional bathroom. Guests can visit the on-site fitness center at Provident Doral at the Blue Miami or schedule a massage at the spa and wellness center. A hot tub is also on site as well as a sauna. The Chophouse 5300 is an on-site restaurant at this resort and there is also the Poolside Bar and Grill open seasonally. This property is 16 mi from the shores of Miami Beach. The Lincoln Road Mall offers many shopping options and is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort
description: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort welcomes you to savor an exceptional experience at our exquisitely appointed retreat in Miami Beach, FL. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: Carillon Miami Wellness Resort
description: Located on 750 feet of private beach along the Atlantic Ocean, Carillon Miami Beach is located in Miami Beach, Florida. Spa services from neuromuscular therapy to body rituals, skin care treatments, and pedicures as well as a salon are offered. Bathrobes and slippers add comfort to each suite. A flat-screen TV, free WiFi, and a fully equipped kitchenette with granite counters are featured. The bathroom is spa-inspired, tiled with Italian glass and stone flooring. Boasting 4 pools and 4 hot tubs, Carillon also has over 40 fitness classes available each day. A cycling and walking trail surrounds the property, and a rock-climbing wall is featured on site. The Strand Bar and Grill restaurant features seasonal cuisine, ocean views, and floor-to-ceiling windows as well as an outdoor patio. The Cabana services light fare with cocktails, and The Corner Store serves juice. Premium shopping at the Lincoln Road Mall is 4.8 mi away, and the La Gorce Golf Course is 6 minutes' drive from the hotel. Within 20 minutes' drive of the hotel are Jungle Island, the Art Deco District, and the Greater Miami Convention and Visitors Bureau.

name: DoubleTree Resort & Spa by Hilton Ocean Point-N. Miami Beach
address: 17375 Collins Avenue, North Miami Beach, FL 33160
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: guest internet access: two beach chairs: two beach towels: 25% discount on food in restaurant outlets: two bottles of water: 15% salon discount: local and toll-free calls. The Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa - Miami Beach North is a full service, beachfront resort hotel and spa situated between the Bal Harbour and Aventura areas of the northern section of Miami Beach. Ideally located in sunny south Florida, the Ocean Point Resort hotel is less than 30 minutes from either Miami International Airport (MIA) or Fort Lauderdale / Hollywood International Airport (FLL). This exquisite resort hotel features spacious guestrooms and one- or two-bedroom apartment-style suites with fully equipped kitchens. Our luxurious accommodations include refrigerator, wet bar, microwave, washer and dryer, high-speed internet access (wired and wireless), and panoramic ocean views from all guest rooms. Most rooms and suites have a balcony. At the Ocean Point Resort, we believe in pampering. Indulge yourself with full-service European-style spa and beauty salon treatments. Have a massage in one of our hotel oceanside cabanas - you're worth it. We recommend that you call 786-528-2900 in advance of your arrival for Spa reservations and treatment details. Dine overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in The View restaurant, serving Continental cuisine and fresh seafood with a Miami flair. Or, try The Market Coffee Shop & Deli for lighter fare in casual surroundings just steps from the pool and beach. For special events or social occasions, our versatile meeting rooms and outdoor terraces can accommodate up to 300 guests. Allow our talented professionals to create your dream wedding reception in the most spectacular atmosphere. Go snorkeling or sport fishing. Relax under a beach umbrella. Explore the exclusive Bal Harbour Shops or Aventura Mall. Enjoy sightseeing and gallery-browsing along Miami Beach's historic Art Deco District. Take the family to Miami Seaquarium or Parrot Jungle. There is so much to see and do in the Miami area - or opt to do nothing at all. Our attentive, caring hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to the Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa with our special, signature warm chocolate-chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Four Seasons Hotel At The Surf Club
description: This 1930s-era Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club is in the northern Miami Beaches on Collins Avenue 5.7 mi from South Beach and 13 mi from Downtown Miami. Features include on-site restaurant, beach, and pool area. Oceanfront dining is possible at the Amalfi Coast-inspired Le Sirenuse Miami and Champagne Bar & Lounge, which is a sister restaurant to the Michelin-starred Le Sirenuse's La Sponda in Positano, Italy. The property features architecture by Pritzker-prize winning architect, Richard Meier, and interior designer Joseph Dirandan. A holistic spa, fitness center, and kid's club are offered. The front desk is open 24 hours. Custom furnishings, a flat-screen TV, and floor-to-ceiling windows in addition to a marble bathroom are standard in every Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club room. Some rooms have a balcony with an ocean or city view, and 5 unique Cabana Studios are offered as well. Bal Harbor Shops is 16 minutes' walk away, while the Miami Beach Convention Center is 5.6 mi from Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club. Lincoln Road is 6.2 mi from the property, and Miami International Airport is 15 mi away.

name: Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach
description: This hotel is located in South Beach, and offers a sun deck, an express check-in and check-out feature and an outdoor pool. It is ideally positioned for those wishing to discover the area's attractions. Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach boasts a range of recreational amenities, including bicycle rental and Outdoor Pool & Cabanas. Welcoming and helpful staff are available 24 hours a day. There are 75 rooms at Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach houses both a restaurant and a lounge bar where guests are able to relax of an evening. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of eating options are also found in the surrounding area. Local attractions near the hotel include the Holocaust Memorial of the Greater Miami Jewish Federation, Miami Beach Convention Center and Lincoln Road. Miami City Ballet is within a 10-minute walk and Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport is 40 minutes' drive away.Revato

name: The Sagamore Hotel South Beach
description: This modern hotel in Miami Beach offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as meeting rooms and an outdoor pool. It is conveniently located for those wanting to visit the area's popular attractions. This art deco hotel provides a range of amenities, including a concierge, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. The Sagamore Hotel has 101 rooms, all of which are filled with a variety of amenities to ensure an enjoyable stay. The Sagamore Hotel provides a range of places to have a meal, including Canvas and Video Bar. A continental breakfast is served every day and room service is available for guests travelling at a more leisurely pace. A selection of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. The Sagamore Hotel is also moments from the area's popular establishments, plus Lincoln Road is a 10-minute stroll away. It is also within walking distance of Miami City Ballet, Miami Beach Convention Center and the Holocaust Memorial of the Greater Miami Jewish Federation.Revato

name: Global Luxury Suites at Monte Carlo
description: Located in Miami Beach, a 3-minute walk from Miami Beach and 1.7 miles from Surfside Beach, Global Luxury Suites at Monte Carlo has accommodations with free Wifi, air conditioning, a private beach area and a rooftop pool. Private parking is available on site. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with sea or pool views. The apartment offers 4-star accommodations with a hot tub and fitness center. A bicycle rental service is available at Global Luxury Suites at Monte Carlo. New World Center is 4.6 miles from the accommodation, while Holocaust Memorial is 4.6 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from Global Luxury Suites at Monte Carlo.

name: Miami Vacation Rentals - Brickell
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 15 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and ovens. Rooms have private furnished balconies. 50-inch Smart televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided on request. Amenities Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, laundry facilities, and a library. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location In the heart of Miami, Miami Vacation Rentals - Brickell is within a 5-minute drive of Brickell City Centre and Bayside Marketplace. This 4-star hotel is 1.1 mi (1.8 km) from Miami-Dade Arena and 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from PortMiami. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Optional Charges Self parking fee: USD 35 per night (in/out privileges) Valet parking fee: USD 42 per day Late check-in fee: USD 40 for check-in between 9:00 PM and 9:30 AM Housekeeping is available for an additional fee Crib (infant bed) fee: USD 20.0 per stay Rollaway bed fee: USD 20.0 per stay The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 9:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 23 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation This property accepts credit cards and cash Onsite parties or group events are strictly prohibited Safety features at this property include a carbon monoxide detector, a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property There is no front desk at this property. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 24 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests will be asked to provide the property with a copy of their government-issued photo ID before arrival. If you are planning to arrive after 9:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests will receive an email 72 hours before arrival with check-in instructions. The host will greet guests on arrival. Guests driving to the property should contact this property in advance. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions Events/parties not allowed Property uses a professional cleaning service Property is cleaned with disinfectant Social distancing measures are in place Contactless check-in is available Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is available Property follows sanitization practices of SafeHome (VRMA & VRHP) Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Sole Miami, A Noble House Resort
address: 17315 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: This oceanfront hotel features direct beach access, sea and pool view restaurant with a bar. Shopping, dining and entertainment at Miami Beach are 20 minute's drive away. Aventura Mall and Bal Harbor Shops are both within 3.7 mi of the property. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort hotel guest rooms are furnished with iPod docking stations and flat-screen cable TVs. Suites offer a seating area and all rooms include a private balcony. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort features an outdoor swimming pool with ocean views. Guests can also take advantage of the tour desk for help discovering the area. Miami Beach's historic Art Deco district, which offers unique shops and famous restaurants, is also close by. Oleta River State Park is 10 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Private Residences At Hotel Arya By Sofla Vacations
description: Located within the Sonesta Coconut Grove Hotel, the Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations offer a heated outdoor pool, hot tub, free WiFi, and free private on-site parking. Miami city center is 4.3 mi away. Every suite and apartment has a seating area and a dining table. Apartments have a full kitchen including an oven, stove, and dishwashwer. Ocean, skyline, and river views are available. Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations features a sauna, fully equipped fitness center, and 2 squash courts. A 24-hour front desk and room service are offered for convenience. Guests can enjoy a meal of continental and Peruvian specialties at either of the 2 on-site restaurants which overlook Coconut Grove and Sailboat Bay. CocoWalk with chic shopping venues is 3 minutes' away. Miami Beach is 8.1 mi from Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations, and the nearest airport, Miami Airport, is 5 mi from the property.

name: East Miami
description: Strategically located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Miami. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a coffee bar and an express check-in and check-out feature. East Miami features an around the clock reception, as well as a concierge and meeting rooms. For added convenience, it offers luggage storage, a safe and room service. The hotel also has its very own gym, BEAST. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a private bathroom, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all feature ironing facilities, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Quinto La Huella, the in-house restaurant, serves lunch and dinner and offers South American meals. Lunch are served daily at Domain. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Sugar. Miami's attractions, such as Icon Brickell, 701 Brickell Avenue and Plaza on Brickell, are within a 10-minute walk of East Miami. There are also a variety of popular restaurants serving local and international cuisine in the surrounding area.Revato

name: The Elser Hotel Miami
description: Located in Miami, a 6-minute walk from American Airlines Arena, The Elser Hotel Miami provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is a 3-minute walk from Bayside Market Place, and within 500 yards of the city center. At the hotel each room is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Elser Hotel Miami has certain rooms with city views, and rooms contain a balcony. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. At The Elser Hotel Miami you'll find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. At the hotel guests are welcome to use a hot tub. Guests at The Elser Hotel Miami will be able to enjoy activities in and around Miami, like cycling. The accommodation provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near The Elser Hotel Miami include Bayfront Park, Bayfront Park Station and Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.8 miles from the hotel.

name: 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection
description: Located in Miami Beach, a 4-minute walk from Miami Beach, 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The property has a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. New World Center is 4.1 miles from the accommodation, while Holocaust Memorial is 4.1 miles away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection.

name: Loews Miami Beach Hotel
description: Located in South Beach, Loews Miami Beach Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Miami Beach (FL). The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Loews Miami Beach Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Loews Miami Beach Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Miami Beach (FL) or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Hotel Aka Brickell
description: The following services and amenities are available, but with reduced service: Fitness Center, Breakfast, On-site Restaurant(s), Pool, Room Service, Valet Parking.The following services and amenities are currently not available: Business Center, Concierge, Spa.Decidedly modern, boldly conceived, and beautifully designed, this luxury hotel creates a unique sensory experience for its guests. The 203 guest rooms and 103 residence suites were stylishly created with a sophisticated traveler in mind, combining some of the finest services with high-tech facilities. Located in a concave building of glittering glass and steel, AKA Hotel Brickell features a minimalist and contemporary design, in the of heart Miami's business district. Our Brickell Avenue address provides guests with easy access to many area attractions, including South Beach, Coconut Grove and Key Biscayne, and is just 15 minutes from Miami International Airport. Overlooking the sparkling Biscayne Bay and within walking distance to a myriad of shopping and dining destinations, you couldn't be better placed. As perfectly formed as the Miami skyline, this sleek downtown luxury hotel offers an array of room options, including guest rooms, studios, and one and two bedroom residence suites. Capturing a sense of understated elegance, and accessorized with complementary elements of glass, wood, leather and metal, AKA Hotel Brickell welcomes you to experience the city's innate sense of style and flair. Experience a symphony of International flavors and style at Level 25 - Miami's only restaurant and lounge, 25 stories in the sky. Discover how world-class vintages of The Wine Attic pair perfectly with Atrio's progressive, global fare. After, whet your palate with a creative cocktail at The Bar, while sharing savory Spanish pintxos, perfectly executed with an innovative twist. Elevate your nose for wine with a fine selection of wines by the glass and personalized attention of our on-staff sommelier.FarePortal

name: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne Miami
address: 455 Grand Bay Drive, Key Biscayne, FL 33149
description: Escape to a luxury Miami Beach resort that exudes the classic charm of South Florida. Located on an exclusive five-mile-long barrier island, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is just minutes from dynamic downtown, yet provides an atmosphere of sequestered serenity. With elegant architecture inspired by West Indies Colonial design, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is one of the finest beach hotels Miami, Florida has to offer.Marriott

name: Yotel Boston
description: YOTEL Boston offers comfortable accommodation and is a brief walk from Courthouse Bus Station. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests of this 4-star hotel can plan sightseeing trips with the assistance of the tour desk. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. All rooms are air conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with a laptop safe, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. They all offer heating, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. Those staying at YOTEL Boston can relax at the in-house bar, ideally based for a drink. The hotel is within walking distance of Boston Convention and Exhibition Center, Long Wharf Boston and New England Aquarium. It is within a 20-minute stroll of South Station, which allows convenient access in and around Boston.Revato

name: Club Quarters Hotel Faneuil Hall, Boston
description: Located 558 feet away from Post Office Square in Boston's Financial District, this hotel is 1804 feet away from the Orpheum Theater. It features an on-site restaurant and modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. A flat-screen TV and iPod docking station are included in the guest rooms at Club Quarters Hotel Faneuil Hall, Boston. They are furnished with picture windows and a hardwood desk. In the lounge of Boston Club Quarters, guests can relax with a cup of coffee in front of the fireplace. The Elephant & Castle Pub and Restaurant features a range of British dishes and North American favorites. The on-site gym features floor-to-ceiling mirrors and a mounted TV. A business center is located off of the lobby. Club Quarters Boston is 919 feet from the Downtown Crossing Market and 2133 feet from Fanueil Hall and Quincy Market.

name: Encore Boston Harbor
description: Located in Everett, Encore Boston Harbor Resort is a perfect starting point from which to explore Everett (MA). The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Facilities like 24-hour room service, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, postal service are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer flat screen television, linens, mirror, towels, smoke detector to ensure a restful night. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room, or take advantage of the fitness center, massage. Discover all Everett (MA) has to offer by making Encore Boston Harbor Resort your base.priceline.com

name: Mandarin Oriental, Boston
description: This 5-star hotel is located in the historic Back Bay district in Boston. It offers a full-service spa, a gourmet restaurant and a full-service gym. WiFi access is available. Each room at the Mandarin Oriental Boston will provide you with a TV, a mini-bar and designer linens. En suite marble bathrooms feature a bath or shower. Extras include a seating area, a DVD player and cable channels. The on-site spa is one of the only Forbes Five-Star awarded spas in Massachusetts. Guests can also enjoy the on-site French restaurant Bar Boulud as well as cocktails at the hotel's M Bar & Lounge. Other facilities at the Mandarin Oriental Boston include a fitness center, a ticket service and on-site shopping. The hotel is located next to The Shops at Prudential Center, 656 feet from Hynes Convention Center and 984 feet from Prudential Tower. Logan International Airport is 3.7 mi away.

name: The Newbury Boston
description: This 5-star hotel provides elegant accommodation in Boston and is within walking distance of Arlington Railway Station. It also has views of Public Garden and Boston Commons. This cosy hotel provides vip rooms, meeting rooms and a library. Honeymoon suites are available for those looking for some added luxury. There are 286 rooms at The Newbury Boston, each offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. The Newbury Boston offers a variety of places to have a meal, including The Rooftop and The Street Bar. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. The hotel is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Boston with the Boston Public Library and Copley Square within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit Prudential Center, Back Bay and Boston Freedom Trail.Revato
